title: Contact tracing, explained
description:
Public health's "tried and true" tactic against infectious disease, and how Google and Apple want to help end the lockdown.

Featuring
@sxbegle
@russellbrandom

Links to resources discussed:
Answering the 12 biggest questions about Apple and Google's new coronavirus tracking project 

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.
